name: The Cube Runner [A Speedrun Platformer]
description:
The Cube Runner!
(Fullscreen Recommended)
------------------------------------ About Game! ➡️ You are a cube and are challenged with a series of obstacles!
➡️ Jump around and avoid spikes to reach the end!
➡️ There is also a timer in case you want to speedrun the game! (Can you beat the world record?)
------------------------------------------------------------
  Controls
➡️ WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
➡️ W or UP ARROW to jump!
-----------------------------------------------------------
   Credits
➡️ All art and code by me!
➡️ Music by Kevin Macleod
➡️ Follow me on Scratch!: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/KrazyKernel/
----------------------------------------------------------
